submission:
class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, q: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        l = list(range(-1, n - 1))
        r = list(range(1, n + 1))
        l[0] = 0
        r[n - 1] = n - 1
        v = n - 1
        res = []
        for x, y in q:
            if r[x] < y:
                while r[x] != y:
                    p = r[x]
                    l[p] = x
                    r[x] = y
                    x = p
                    v -= 1
            res.append(v)
        return res
